content:
ZOrderConstants Enum

Definition

Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 ZOrder method.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
public enum ZOrderConstants
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ZOrderConstants

Remarks

In Visual Basic, the Visual Basic ZOrder method is replaced by the BringToFront and SendToBack functions. These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.

Note

Functions and objects in the Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6 namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Fields

BringToFront

Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant vbBringToFront.
SendToBack

Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant vbSend ToBack.
